availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Clark County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Ambrose Bush and Jane Quisenberry. Married to Adelaide Tinsley Bush. Father of Marry Ann Bush, Dane Bush, William M. Bush, Ransom Thomas G. Bush and Sarah S. Bush. Married to Elizabeth Eaton Bush in Clark County, Kentucky, in 1840. Farmer in Clark County in 1850. Owned five enslaved persons in Clark County in 1850. Farmer in Clark County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, p14B.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2.

Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Clark County, District 2, 341B.
Kentucky Death Certificates, 1911-1965, Kentucky Office of Vital Statistics, KDLA, Frankfort, KY, File 3575.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Clark County Marriages, Film 001943687, p. 64.
Sons of the American Revolution Membership Applications, 1889-1970, National Society of the Sons of the American Revolution, Louisville, KY, National 59852, State 2283.
